definition: exterior surface/family relationship via females/to show (one's opinion)/a model/a table (listing information)/a form/a meter (measuring sth)

sentences.english: Readers make the corrections pointed out in the table of errate.
sentences.chinese: 讀者根據勘誤表進行補正。

sentences.english: Readers are requested to make the corrections pointed out in the errata.
sentences.chinese: 要求讀者根據勘誤表匡正。

sentences.english: Read the errata for the version you plan to install.
sentences.chinese: 參閱您計劃安裝版本的勘誤表。
